short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly delete messages on X, LinkedIn, ChatGPT, and more. Clean up chats with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Advantages:
* Time-Saving: Delete bulk or archive messages quickly with one click.
* User-Friendly: Easy-to-navigate interface ensures a seamless experience.
* Versatile: Supports message deletion across multiple platforms (X, LinkedIn, ChatGPT & more).
* Control: Stop the deletion process anytime for added flexibility.
* Clutter-Free: Keep your messaging apps organized and tidy.

How It Works:
1. Install the Extension: Begin by adding the extension to your browser from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Click on the Icon: Once installed, click on the extension icon located in your browser's toolbar.
3. Select Your Platform: A list of supported messaging platforms will appear. Choose the one you wish to use (X, LinkedIn, ChatGPT & other).
4. Follow the Instructions: Click the designated button to start the deletion process. The interface is 5. user-friendly and guides you through each step effortlessly.
6. Stop the Process Anytime: If you need to halt the operation, simply click the stop button it bottom popup at any time, giving you full control over your message management.

Note: This extension is not authorized or affiliated with any messaging platform, including X, LinkedIn,  ChatGPT or more.
